item.description:
I suddenly got free to attend this Meetup in W. Hartford, I'm cross-promoting it down here. Hurry up though, it's tonight! Some friends & I are going out dancing at Shish Lounge, W. Hartford. Come on and dance!
http://www.shishloung...

I'll be there 9:30.

No cover if you get there before 10.

They have a "casual dressy" code, no sport-style headwear, nice jeans are ok but don't show up in beat-up jeans, t-shirt, and sneakers.

HOST: Jason, cell # in my RSVP (noisy club, texting probably best)

PARKING: Free parking in their lot on 901 Farmington Ave (across the street) and the hotel garage.
item.how_to_find_us: Text me when you're close to arriving. Also, I'm tall, 6'3"
item.name: Sat 1/15 - Dancing tonight at Shish Lounge, W. Hartford
